import { Chart } from './components/Chart'
import { Table } from './components/Table'
export const data = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

# Complex MDX Example

<Table data={data.map(n => ({ value: n * 2 }))} />

## Expressions

The sum is {data.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0)}.

<Chart>
  {data.map(n => (
    <Bar key={n} value={n} />
  ))}
</Chart>

## Nested Components

<Card>
  <CardHeader>
    # Markdown in JSX
    
    This is **bold** and *italic*.
  </CardHeader>
  <CardBody>
    - List item 1
    - List item 2
  </CardBody>
</Card>
